xrpl_amm_summary.description: Automated Market Makers (AMMs) provide liquidity pools for two assets, using constant product formula. Requires AMM amendment.

key_features.asset_pairs: One XRP + one token, or two tokens. Unique per pair.
key_features.lp_tokens: Liquidity providers receive LP tokens for deposits, redeemable for share of pool + fees.
key_features.trading: Swaps adjust exchange rate; fees (0-1%) paid to pool.
key_features.voting: LP holders vote on fees, weighted by tokens.
key_features.auction_slot: Bid LP tokens for 24h fee discount.
key_features.restrictions: No LP tokens, authorized trust lines, clawback enabled assets.
key_features.integration: Works with DEX offers for optimal paths.
key_features.deletion: Withdraw all assets to delete AMM.

xrpl_amm_summary.usage: Deposit/withdraw via AMMDeposit/AMMWithdraw; vote with AMMVote; bid with AMMBid. Useful for DeFi liquidity without order books.
